channel.title: New Server Project ~STILL LOOKING FOR NEW CODERS~
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/5006/55137218.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][u]Base[/u][/b]: Blank PI
[B][SIZE=5]Information/Features:[/SIZE][/B]
All features will be listed here when we start coding.
[B][SIZE=5]Pictures/Images:[/SIZE][/B]
All images will be added here.
I want to start this progress with new coders,(I am new to, trust me...) NOT the "pro's", (it's mostly to learn from ourself not just get help from all the pro's)[/center]
[center][size=2][b]Staff List[/b][/size]
Coders:
[b]4/5[/b]
Quackie Nickog15 Frankpetrov Lil_Smok3r Person 5
Suggestors:
[b]0/2[/b]
Person 1 Person 2
[/center]
[center]Requirements to join:
NOT BE EXPERIENCED IN CODING(Not for suggesters) Atleast some knowledge about RSPS's Skype
To apply, use this layout:
[code] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: Skype name?: How long have you coded(Dont answer if you want to be suggester)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\ [/code]
We now have a source, but we're only 2 coders that can work on it. (I know it says 3 /\ but he cant code Atm.) So remember we're still looking for NEW coders![/center]

item.title: New Server Project ~STILL LOOKING FOR NEW CODERS~
item.dc:creator: @ByteSized ByteSized
item.description:
@ByteSized wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: ByteSized
How old are you?: 17
Skype name?:
How long have you coded(Dont answer if you want to be suggester)?: About 5 months. Not in RSPS, just regular Java
What time zone are you in?: -5:00GMT
How long will you be on everyday?: Pretty lengthy
Why do you want to become part of this server?: I’d like to learn how to code RSPS’s
//Other Info Below Here\
I have some knowledge of RSPS, intermediate with just regular Java.

Read full topic
item.source: New Server Project ~STILL LOOKING FOR NEW CODERS~

item.title: New Server Project ~STILL LOOKING FOR NEW CODERS~
item.dc:creator: @Exzilled Exzilled
item.description:
@Exzilled wrote:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Exzilled - For both.
How old are you?: 16
Skype name?: Exzilled-Zack
How long have you coded(Dont answer if you want to be suggester)?: I coded a few years back for a few months, but other things became more important, I’d like to come back and actually start learning.
What time zone are you in?: GMT - England.
How long will you be on everyday?: I can be on for up to 12-14+ Hours a day
Why do you want to become part of this server?: I’d really like to be a part of a team that has the same interest as me, I’ve wanted to go back into coding for a while now just never took the action to it. Now i have and this seems a great opportunity to be around like-minded people all doing the same thing and wanting it to be a great success.
//Other Info Below Here\
I take quite a few smoke breaks, I’m sure you’ll deal with that if you choose me.

Read full topic

item.title: New Server Project ~STILL LOOKING FOR NEW CODERS~
item.dc:creator: @Quackie Quackie
item.description:
@Quackie wrote:

Well, i dont wanna be the one chosing everything we do, this is a team job. But what i can tell now is that we’re going to start from a clean base and make it into a 317 with many features such as: Minigames, PvMing, Pking, Gambling (Maybe), All skills, all those kind of things.

item.title: New Server Project ~STILL LOOKING FOR NEW CODERS~
item.dc:creator: @Quackie Quackie
item.description:
@Quackie wrote:

[quote=“nickog15, post:7, topic:444885”]Depends on how hard you want to work on it. We could use a source with nothing in it, which is what i would want to do. We could also build on some other server that is already released. I would like to start new one because i want to apply the java that i am learning to to server. But whatever you want you are the owner.[/quote]We can use a clean source, no problem

[quote=“fier12, post:10, topic:444885”]In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Fier12

How old are you?: 14 1/2

Skype name?: Habbofier11

How long have you coded?: 3-4 1/2 years

What time zone are you in?: GMT 5+ Canada and United States --> In Minnesota

How long will you be on everyday?: As long As i need to.

Why do you want to become part of this server?: I really want to see how far this RsPS Server will go, and because i really like
your epic banner =P[/quote]You seem to have been coding for a while… I need to think about it. I’ll edit this when im done thinking. EDIT: What have you been coding in your 3-4 1/2 years?

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:9, topic:444885”][qoute]I want to start this progress with new coders,(I am new to, trust me…) NOT the “pro’s”, (it’s mostly to learn from ourself not just get help from all the pro’s)[/qoute]

This is a good logical idea.

Good luck to you and your team.[/quote]Thanks

[quote=“ninja1377, post:8, topic:444885”]In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: Frankpetrov
How old are you?: 19
Skype name?: armykid1377
How long have you coded(Dont answer if you want to be suggester)?: In java, 3 day.
What time zone are you in?: -5 EST
How long will you be on everyday?: weekdays 4+ hours, weekends 10+ hours
Why do you want to become part of this server?: I am quite interested in java and rsps. However, anytime I decide to try to do one myself, I lose focus due to the lack of others helping out and keeping me motivated. However, once I’m in a group working on a project, I stay motivated and bug everyone else to stay motivated to complete the project.[/quote]Congratz, you are the new team member Adding you on skype in a bit.

Read full topic

How old are you?: 15
MSN: nickog15, i forgot skype info.
How long have you coded(Dont answer if you want to be suggester)?:Uhm… 2 years awhile back, quit, started around 5 months ago again?

How long will you be on everyday?: Depends… But more then you need. note might work this summer so i might not have as much time but still lots of time.
Why do you want to become part of this server?: Because i have never been on a “team” so i want to see how it is like.
//Other Info Below Here\
<(^.^<) ^(^.^)^ (>^.^)> ^(^.^)> <(^.^)^ (^.^) -(^.^)-
I don’t know i was just bored.[/quote] Ok you’re in, but i dont have Msn…
